description: {"blocks":[{"key":"4hr6d","text":"LI Detector's imageanalyzer function makes the use of the MATLAB Colony Analyzer Toolkit to generate colony size estimations from image files.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":58,"length":30}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"538768206BF311EB8E674393CB6DEF8E","url":"https://github.com/brazilbean/Matlab-Colony-Analyzer-Toolkit"}}}}
keywords: ,phenomics, genomics, computational biology, yeast, microbiology, high-throughput, screening, colony, colony size

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8eknt","text":"Execute Step 1 to 7 of the LI Detector Analytical Pipeline","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":31}],"data":{}},{"key":"l6mr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56an","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1qp5p","text":"Note: The order of the plates in the upscale pattern from Step 6 of the pipeline should be the same as the order of images within the folders.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"4A1ED1C06BF711EB8E674393CB6DEF8E","url":"https://www.protocols.io/private/21D4D9D12A7E11EBAB590A58A9FEAC2A"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"54rdo","text":"Photos should be organized as Experiment \u003e Arm \u003e Stage \u003e Hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5b8qd","text":"Within the Hours folder the photos should be arranged in the same order as the plate names/number","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6hj1d","text":"Example","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dgr1e","text":"        - If you were conducting an experiment using the mutant collection","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"454k2","text":"        - The experiment had two parallel arms going from 384 density plates (Starter Plates) to 1536 density plates (Pre-screen) to 6144 density plates (Final Screen)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"97ojo","text":"        - Photos for the Starter Plates and Pre-screen were taken at saturation and those for Final Screen were taken at 0, 4 and 12 hours","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5hdno","text":"        - {"blocks":[{"key":"d0har","text":"Information to keep in hand before proceeding:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dnbgk","text":"Path to MALTAB directory ","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ac6g","text":"Path to lidetector directory","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"53l1p","text":"Path to where the JDBC driver was unzipped from Step 3 of LI Detector Analytical Pipeline","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dv86s","text":"Path to the 'Stage' level photos from Step 1","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"anjoc","text":"Location of any smudges on the plates ie the colonies you want to remove from the analysis because of any technical issues - plate number, row number, column number","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a20mc","text":"Successful completion of this command will generate:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"eoj10","text":"_RAW = raw colony size estimations per hour per position id of all the images","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":4}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"drb6f","text":"_smudgebox = position ids to be excluded from analysis that correspond to the user defined coordinates","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":1,"length":9}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a50vv","text":"_JPEG = clean version of the raw table with border colonies, colonies corresponding to the smudge box and those colonies with pixel count of less than 10 NULL'd","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6jb07","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ukcl","text":"Example files can be found in Data.zip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":30,"length":8}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"C897E39A6BF611EB84BB0A58A9FEAC2A","url":"https://github.com/sauriiiin/lidetector/blob/master/Data.zip"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ddd","text":"Image Quality Check","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a1l8f","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"67q29","text":"Are all the images in the right orientation? - top left corner of the plate should be at the top left corner of the image.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bp6g8","text":"Are there the expected number of images in your folders?","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5it1","text":"Do all the images have a uniform black background? Any 'white' in the background will cause the MATLAB Colony Analyzer Toolkit (MCAT) to falsely select it as a colony and fail.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"p73p","text":"Make sure that all the images are ordered correctly.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fc7e0","text":"Take note of any 'smudges' or problem colonies on the plates. One might consider adding these to the smudgebox when prompted.","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: LID: imageanalyzer
